entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strange behavior between Release and Debug builds [Random access violations and null exceptions] #78839
  • Breaking change: The behaviour of System.IO.Path.GetFullPath has changed for some reserved filenames. #78834
  • [Mono][Android] App crashes with InvalidProgramException #78833
    8.0.0
  • net7.0 app crashes in ProfilerAddNewRegion after profiler attach #78831
    8.0.0
  • Synchronous calls in XsdValidatingReader #78802
  • Process.GetProcessesByName() error on linux #78800
  • Build support for unknown archs - Loongarch in my case #78797
  • How to disable building of Mono on Loongarch #78796

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/13/2022 2:25:23 AM #78806
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 10/13/2022 5:08:18 AM #78808
  • [API Proposal]: Align System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.DllCharacteristics with PE spec #71362
    8.0.0
  • Dereferencing before `null` checks #78634
    8.0.0
  • Iterating large queue throws exception #78590
    8.0.0
  • GregorianCalendarHelper, suspicious `%` operator #78627
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 11/7/2022 8:57:30 PM #78819
  • [wasm] consider bumping devDependencies #78708
  • Printing error messages in CoreCLR #9419
    Future
  • Cannot export certificate data even with X509KeyStorageFlags.Exportable #77590
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #78791
  • System.IO.Compression bug #78264
  • Command line arguments not parsing with section #57568
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78841
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Disable CG on Linux musl installer jobs too #78832
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #78818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT DivToMul test #78816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable mark phase prefetching for segments #78803
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Convert pointers in a couple tables to relative #78801
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Place non-GC statics in the dehydratable section #78795
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Alternative fix for GC pal linking (without the size_t related change for MacOS) #78792
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • Implement Equals & GetHashCode for LingerOption - fix Socket outerloop tests #78747
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • linux-requirements.md: add missing line-continuation #78476
    area-Meta
  • Clarify docs for Leading/TrailingZeroCount #78510
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix some duplicative null checks #78727
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary % in ToFourDigitYear #78728
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] bump devDependencies to rollup 3 and TypeScript 4.9 #78726
    area-Build-mono
  • Bigger workitem timeout (for perf slow pipeline) #78632
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove pointer relocs from GC statics #78794
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2052742 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for serializing properties in interface hierarchies #78788
    enhancement, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Change MetricSpec.TryParse to be Parse #78729
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #78755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.2
  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78756
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Aging dependent handles #78746
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    NO-MERGE, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0
